none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 31, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
The tunes are snotty and straightforward hardcore punk, almost rudimentary at times. But FELDSPAR wins with the presentation; blown out naturally, chaotic unintentionally, on edge constantly. They take basic shit and make it sound urgent as anything....gratuitous samples, three chord riffs, copious amounts of distortion and a strained voice piercing through the mire. "Morag" is the coolest song I will listen to today. Good shit. FELDSPAR
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-jeLV2LddWsg/VMztKp-ixGI/AAAAAAAALjI/3M9h1WOlX7E/s1600/feldspar%2Bcover.jpg http://feldspar666.bandcamp.com/ //2.bp.blogspot.com/-JMExQKc-zGQ/VMzuoNjTx9I/AAAAAAAALjU/56hWvjP9zzk/s1600/feldspar%2Bimg1.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-k_L9V5pZPtc/VMzuvdfCTOI/AAAAAAAALjc/AGcRKmfBDOI/s1600/feldspar%2Bimg2.jpg

seo.title: Feldspar - Feldspar demo 2014 - Terminal Escape
